Package org.hl7.hpath

Interface Summary
Conversion.Definition  
HPathIterator A common interface extending the standard java.util.Interator interface as a uniform result of the evaluation of HPath Expressions.
 

Class Summary
Conversion<S,T> A Conversion expression form can be used to turn business objects from and to string representations, for example.
CSasEnumStringConversion  
EmptyIterator A pseudo-iterator for no object at all, use this instead of dealing with Java nulls.
Expression The abstract Expression for HPath.
IIasExtensionStringConversion  
Macros A macro which we replace before parsing an expression.
SingletonIterator A pseudo-iterator for a single object.
StaticContext  
Test
